CustomField.description:
Uses Apex managed sharing to grants users read or edit access to their log records (on insert only). When no access level is specified, no Apex sharing logic is executed.
Possible Values: (blank) Read Edit
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Uses Apex managed sharing to grants users read or edit access to their log records (on insert only). When no access level is specified, no Apex sharing logic is executed.
Possible Values: (blank) Read Edit
CustomField.label: Log Records Access Level
